title: Getting physical: body architect, designer and science fiction artist Lucy McRae
text:
Body architect, designer and science fiction artist Lucy McRae uses film and images to consider how technology could transform the human body in the future. McRae’s work encourages conversations on the future of human existence through the areas of biology, beauty and health. The first survey exhibition of McRae’s provocative and beguiling work, Lucy McRae Body Architect, explores the Los Angeles-based Australian artist’s collaborations with Dutch textile artist Bart Hess, as well as with scientists and pop musicians, in her creative research practice over the past 13 years.

Lucy McRae Body Architect is on display from Friday 30 August 2019 to February 2020 at the Ian Potter Centre: NGV Australia at Federation Square. Entry is free. Visit ngv.vic.gov.au
